description: A nine-year old girl, Miho dreams of one day drawing manga. After Mystery Man gives her Pigu and Mogu, they in turn give her a magical pen and sketchbook, which allow her to transform into a 15-year old girl who she names Fancy Lala. Fancy Lala is scouted by Haneishi Yumi of Lyrical Productions, and gradually follows the path to stardom.
name: Shinohara Miho
